survey_brief: This survey aims to assess resident satisfaction with community engagement initiatives and identify opportunities for improving social interactions within the apartment complex.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current community engagement activities offered in your apartment complex?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Ensure mobile-friendly radio button layout.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current community engagement activities offered in your apartment complex?

questions.question_text: Which types of community events would you be most interested in attending? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Consider follow-up questions for 'None of the above' responses.

script.question_text: Which types of community events would you be most interested in attending? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What factors prevent you from participating in community events?
answer_options: Lack of interest in offered activities
Prefer not to socialize with neighbors
questions.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who selected 'None of the above' in Q2 or rated satisfaction 3 or below in Q1
questions.client_notes: Include 'Other' with open text field. Useful for identifying barriers.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Checkbox with optional text input

script.question_text: What factors prevent you from participating in community events?
answer_options: Lack of interest in offered activities
Prefer not to socialize with neighbors
script.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who selected 'None of the above' in Q2 or rated satisfaction 3 or below in Q1

questions.question_text: How often do you interact with neighbors in common areas?
questions.client_notes: Helps gauge baseline community interaction levels.

script.question_text: How often do you interact with neighbors in common areas?

questions.question_text: What improvements would make you more likely to participate in community activities?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture unique suggestions. Limit to 300 characters.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Open text with character counter

script.question_text: What improvements would make you more likely to participate in community activities?

questions.question_text: Would you be interested in helping organize community events?
questions.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who rated satisfaction 4 or above in Q1
questions.client_notes: Identifies potential event ambassadors. Follow up with interested respondents.

script.question_text: Would you be interested in helping organize community events?
script.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who rated satisfaction 4 or above in Q1

questions.question_text: Which communication channel do you prefer for receiving event information?
questions.client_notes: Important for optimizing outreach efforts. 'Other' field reveals new channels.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Checkbox with optional text input

script.question_text: Which communication channel do you prefer for receiving event information?
